1.1.0.en: Added multiple Power Saving Zones- and location related capabilities and flow cards. Bugfixes and stability improvements.

1.2.0.en: Added virtual fence related capabilities and flow cards. Improved flow cards.

1.2.1.en: Improved error handling. Removed unnecessary API requests.

1.3.0.en: Allow read only trackers. Improved error handling. Optimized number of API requests.

1.4.0.en: Added charging state triggers and bugfixes.
